channel.title: Npc emotes
channel.description: Hey ,where could I locate the npc emotes, like the death emotes, walking etcetc. Cause my dragons are a bit messed up , id like to change them.

item.title: Npc emotes
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[code]k.B.D or dragon emote

79 = walk
80 = melee atk with claw
81 = fire breath atk
89 = block
90 = stand
91 = melee atk with head
92 = dead[/code]

Read full topic
